ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.D12: Canary Islands, W of La Palma, Punta del Moro; 28°38'N 17°56'W; rocky and sandy coast, depth to 15 m; scuba diving; 2.vi.1980
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.D48: SE coast of Madeira, W of Caniçal; 32°44'N 16°43'W; depth 0-22 m; scuba diving; 11.iii.1976
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.156: off Mauritania; 19°20'N 16°49'W; depth 75 m, sandy clay with gorgonians and bryozoans; van Veen grab; 31.x.1978
AV.740724: Greece, Sporádhes, isl. Ródhos,SE-side Ródhos harbour; 24.vii.1974
AV.610409: France, dep. Var, La Capte (= 6 km SSE of Hyeres); 9.iv.1961
GB.10: Egypt, Suez Canal, Great Bitter Lake, NW-side, Sta.10; depth 10.4 m, clay with some fine sand, no vegetation; dredging; viii/ix.1950
GB.04: Egypt, Suez Canal, Great Bitter Lake, SW-side, Sta.4; depth 0.20-0.75 m, muddy and sandy gravel deposits, covered with Halophila (Plant zone 1); dredging; viii/ix.1950
